collectible.title: CBT Article
collectible.subtitle: Yowch!
collectible.text: You have unlocked the legendary Wikipedia article on cock and ball torture! Yowch!
collectible.unlock: Have Wikipe-tan lose playing against at least three males (yourself included) and not be the last to finish her forfeit.

collectible.title: Wikipe-tan's Autograph
collectible.subtitle: And it's all yours!
collectible.text: Signed autograph of Wikipe-tan's photo used for the article for Fan Service on Wikipedia. A text written on the other side reads, "We all make our contributions, whether it is by adding examples, taking care of the site, or donating money. As long as we all strive for the same goal, we will keep moving forward." - Wikipe-tan. https://wikimediafoundation.org/support/
